|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- In MHz, number only Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = AC:22:0B

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = micro USB |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 12/22/2017 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;; |rad1chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== <small> *'''Color images at night''' - AiCam NightView, utilizing a Sony image sensor and video :processor, takes home monitoring to a new level with low-light performance :producing natural-color recordings for easy identification of visitors *'''High-quality images in challenging conditions''' - Wide Dynamic Range (WDR) :technology handles several different lighting conditions, including backlight :and high-contrast scenes, to produce clear, highly detailed footage *'''Safe and free storage for recordings''' - Record video directly to ASUS Cloud Storage :or an SD card to keep recordings safe from physical damage or hardware failure *'''Choose where to keep a watchful eye''' - Keep track of what’s happening at home :with selectable motion detection zones and instant mobile notifications *'''Two-way audio''' - Integrated high-quality speaker and mic support simultaneous :two-way audio for natural conversations </small>
===Specifications=== *Network Standard: 802.11abgn/ac, IPv4, IPv6 *Features: Digital Zoom: 4x, Min Illumination: 0.1 lux :Image sensor: Sony, Size: 1/2.8", Resolution: 2 MP :Aperture: F 1.85, Focal length: 2.3 mm :Resolution: Sensor: 1920 x 1080, Video: 30fps / 1080p :Field of View (H/V/D): 128° / 72° / 147° :Compression: Video: H.264 / MPEG4 / MJPEG, Audio: AAC *Capacity: Cloud storage, Micro SD card (up to 64 GB) *Power Supply: :AC Input : 110~240V (50~60Hz) :DC Output : 5V with max. 2A current
==See also== *[[ASUS AiCam]] - ''Smart Cloud NightView Camera'' • [https://www.unifore.net/ip-video-surveillance/asus-aicam-alternative-d1000-smart-wifi-ip-camera.html PR] *ASUS AiCam 2 - ''Smart Cloud NightView Camera'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/AiCam-2/ PPage] *[[ASUS HG100]] - ''Smart Home Gateway'' • [http://armdevices.net/2016/02/18/asus-hg100-rk3066-smart-home-gateway-via-zigbeewifi-bluetooth/ PR] • [https://mysmahome.com/news/4305/asus-debuts-smart-home-series-using-zigbee-2/ PR] • [https://mysmahome.com/product/6285/product-introduction-asus-smart-home-gateway-hg100/ PR] • [https://www.asus.com/sg/Internet-of-Things/ASUS-SmartHome-Gateway-HG100/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RK903 MSQ-RK903] (2015-04-02), CPU: ''Rockchip'' RK3066 @1.5GHz :Flash/RAM: 8/1GB, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, ZigBee, HDMI 2.0 (4K H.265) *ASUS Reco Classic Dash Cam (Full HD 1080p) - B0105TLZB8 *ASUS Reco Smart Dash Cam & Portable Cam - B075GHGNGX *[[ASUS Zenbo]] - ''Home Robot'' • [http://hexus.net/tech/items/laptop/106402-asus-showcases-new-consumer-lifestyle-products-computex-2017/ Computex 2017 PR] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-ZENBO MSQ-ZENBO] (2017-07-27)
